# Nested List: no nested

- A
- B
- C

# Nested List: 4-space padding

- A
    - B
        - C

<!-- {"layout":"title-and-body"} -->

---

# Nested List: 2-space padding

- A
  - B
    - C
    
<!-- {"layout":"title-and-body"} -->

---

# Nested List: Nested in the middle

- A
  - B
- C
